answers.answer: I am not a dr., but did they do other blood work too;Like vit.b12, thyroid, ect.? Some of them are important.   I guess would say eat/snack healthy, make sure you are drinking lots of water.  Give it a few days and  if you are still feeling the same way.  I would go back and see your dr. (I always keep a journal as to how I am feeling , so I don't forget to tell the dr. Anything when I go in.) You can high light stuff so you don't read every page but I have found it helps.  I hope this helps, let us know how you make out.  Good luck.  JoAnn

question: hi iam 20 year old female .i was sufferin from frequent hunger during day as well as night times. i used to feel dizzy and sudden feel of unconciousness if i had not taken any food in 5 or 10 mins!! lately since three days iam suffering from excessive gastrities n my stomach has blotted n there s severe pain in my abdomen almost like periods pain !! and now my frequency of intake of food has increased than before stii i feel very tired in the day time although i do nothing and every time i urinate i am very tired ..iam tested negetive for diabetes ..kindly help
title: eating disorder
